attributes.action:
Make a law to force  marketplace to sell bikes  with these requirement
-
attributes.additional_details:
Too many bike theft in Uk put a heavy load on police force that is not able to deal with every demand.
- stimulate bike industry by making people confident in ownership of bikes
- battle carbon fuel
attributes.background:
Put in place all the above mentioned to reduce crime of bike theft and stimulate cycling and bike industry.
Make a law to force: 
- compulsory slot of  frame number online for ads
- compulsory data  transfer of ownership online 
- compulsory gps system inside bike frame sold from 2022 online
